TopicTitle: Random Game Crash (Or Maybe Not So Random)

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, I have some mods installed, really not that much (BDArmory, Spanner's Boomsticks, VentZer0's JDAMs, Mk84s and AIM-54, B9 Aerospace).

Recently my game started crashing randomly so I hoped you guys could help me figure out the problem.

**KSP:**0.90.0.705 Beta (most updated version - steam user) Windows x64 (My system is 64bit, but I can't figure out if the game is 32 or 64. I know its kind of a big deal so it would be nice if you guys could guide me through on how to check that.)

**Problem:** Randomly crashes.

**Mods installed:** BDArmory, Spanner's Boomsticks, VentZer0's JDAMs, Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Mk84s and AIM-54, B9 Aerospace

**Reproduction steps:** It happens whenever Im trying to return either to Space Center or "Revert Flight", it loads a bit and then crashes.

**LOG:** [https://www.dropbox.com/s/c4520vl7osi9hpz/2015-03-23_170438.rar?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/c4520vl7osi9hpz/2015-03-23_170438.rar?dl=0)

I thank you in advance gentleman!
